description:
Sabo recounts his surprising reunion with Luffy at the Colosseum as the Straw Hats and the others continue to recoup. Meanwhile, Fujitora gambles on how to make his next move - and the odds are in Luffy`s favor!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Bündnis der Brüder – Die Geschichte von Ruffys und Sabos Wiedersehen
Kyoudai no Kizuna: Luffy Sabo Saikai Hiwa
Le lien fraternel. L`histoire cachée derrière les retrouvailles de Luffy et Sabo
The Brothers` Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo`s Reunion!
Братские узы! История воссоединения Луффи и Сабо!
رابط الإخوة! القصّة غير المرويّة وراء لمّ شمل لوفي وسابو!
兄弟の絆 ルフィ・サボ再会秘話
